mapper.sql: select r.rpno, r.rptno, r.uno, r.cdt, r.status, r.pdt, u.uno, u.nick reporter_nick, u.email reporter_email, ra.arno, rc.cno, a.arno, u2.uno article_uno, u2.nick article_writer, u2.email article_email u3.uno comment_uno, u3.nick comment_writer, u3.email comment_email from report r inner join user u on r.uno=u.uno left outer join repo_arc ra on r.rpno=ra.rpno left outer join article a on ra.arno=a.arno left outer join user u2 on a.writer=u2.uno left outer join repo_comt rc on r.rpno=rc.rpno left outer join comment c on rc.cno=c.cno left outer join user u3 on c.writer=u3.uno
mapper.insert: insert into report(rpno, rptno, uno, cdt) values(#{no}, #{reportTypeNo}, #{reporter.no}, now())
mapper.select:
select r.rpno, r.rptno, r.uno, r.cdt, r.status, r.pdt, u.uno, u.nick reporter_nick, u.email reporter_email, ra.arno, a.arno, u2.uno article_uno, u2.nick article_writer, u2.email article_email from report r inner join user u on r.uno=u.uno left outer join repo_arc ra on r.rpno=ra.rpno left outer join article a on ra.arno=a.arno left outer join user u2 on a.writer=u2.uno
where r.rptno like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
order by r.rpno desc

select r.rpno, r.rptno, r.uno, r.cdt, r.status, r.pdt, u.uno, u.nick reporter_nick, u.email reporter_email, rc.cno, c.arno comment_article, c.cno, c.uno, u3.nick comment_nick, u3.email comment_email from report r inner join user u on r.uno=u.uno left outer join repo_comt rc on r.rpno=rc.rpno left outer join comment c on rc.cno=c.cno left outer join article a on a.arno=c.arno left outer join user u3 on c.uno=u3.uno
where r.rptno like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
order by r.rpno desc

select r.rpno, r.rptno, r.uno, r.cdt, r.status, r.pdt, u.uno, u.nick reporter_nick, u.email reporter_email, ra.arno, a.arno , u2.uno, u2.nick article_writer, u2.email article_email, u3.uno comment_uno, u3.nick comment_writer, u3.email comment_email from report r inner join user u on r.uno=u.uno left outer join repo_arc ra on r.rpno=ra.rpno left outer join article a on ra.arno=a.arno left outer join user u2 on a.writer=u2.uno left outer join repo_comt rc on r.rpno=rc.rpno left outer join comment c on rc.cno=c.cno left outer join user u3 on c.writer=u3.uno where r.rpno=#{no}
